definition: autumn trial (judicial hearing of capital cases during Ming and Qing)

sentences.english: The procedure of the autumn trial system was strict , include local autumn trial with central autumn trial .
sentences.chinese: 秋审制度程序严格，包括地方秋审和中央秋审。

sentences.english: The procedure of the autumn trial system was strict , include local autumn trial with central autumn trial .

definition: the three judicial chief ministries (in imperial China)
governor general 总督 and inspector general 巡抚
Commandant of Justice in imperial China, one of the Nine Ministers 九卿[jiu3 qing1]
xing-ming, a school of thought of the Warring States period associated with Shen Buhai 申不害[Shen1 Bu4 hai4]/the designation for a punishment
beating with wooden staves (as corporal punishment)
Office of Military and Political Affairs (Qing Dynasty)
a hard legal case to judge
